name: A Word on Abuse
description:
A Word on Abuse

Instructions:
Use the mouse cursor to select a dialogue option. This is a browser game.

Description:

Our game is about personal emancipation from abusive relationships. Domestic violence is a political matter and this art game is our humble attempt to contribute to call attention to this issue and help people.

Below are some resources for abuse victims:

International

http://www.hotpeachpages.net/

US

http://www.thehotline.org/

Male victims (UK)

http://www.mensadviceline.org....

In Brazil:

https://www.livredeabuso.com.b...

This game was created for the GAME JAM – ART GAMES promoted by the  Goethe-Institut, in São Paulo. The theme was "emancipation".

Created by Camila Peres (@cmlperes) and Lucas Molina (@AD1337).
